question:
The government is planning to launch Enterprise Development Centres. In this context, consider the following statements:
  1. The initiative is targeted at the MSMEs.
  2. The centres will facilitate credit availability.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Statement 1 is correct: The ministry of micro, small and medium enterprises sector is looking to develop Enterprise Development Centres/ EDC. These are like incubation centres and will produce a good quality cadre of entrepreneurs. The program will be in collaboration with private sector, industrial associations, business management organisations, etc. Statement 2 is correct: The program will facilitate credit for MSMEs. The program will also enable inflow of loans and other incentives to the sector through these EDCs. The Enterprise Clinics will help struggling firms from being pulled down into debt traps and use enterprise development courses to produce a quality cadre.
